data.title: Nbc Savannah Guthrie Height – Just Speak News
data.text:
NBC Savannah Guthrie Height: 7 Interesting Facts About the Renowned Journalist

Savannah Guthrie has become a household name as a prominent journalist and co-anchor on NBC’s Today show. Her captivating presence, insightful interviews, and dedication to delivering the news have earned her a loyal following. While many admire her professional achievements, fans are also curious about her personal life, including her height and other details. In this article, we will explore seven interesting facts about Savannah Guthrie’s height, along with answers to some common questions about her. So let’s dive in and uncover more about this talented journalist.

1. Savannah Guthrie’s Height:

Standing tall at an impressive 5 feet 10 inches (178 cm), Savannah Guthrie possesses a commanding presence on screen. Her statuesque figure, combined with her eloquence and confidence, makes her a captivating presence to watch.

2. Early Life and Education:

Savannah Guthrie was born on December 27, 1971, in Melbourne, Australia. However, she grew up in Tucson, Arizona, after her family relocated to the United States when she was just two years old. Guthrie studied at Amphitheater High School and later attended the University of Arizona, where she earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in Journalism.

3. Journey to Success:

After completing her education, Savannah Guthrie began her career in broadcasting. She worked for various news outlets and climbed the ranks, eventually joining NBC News in 2007. Her remarkable skills as a journalist soon caught the attention of the network, leading to her appointment as the co-anchor of the Today show in 2012, alongside Matt Lauer.

4. Recognition and Awards:

Throughout her career, Savannah Guthrie has received numerous accolades for her outstanding work in journalism. She has been recognized with several Emmy Awards and has been included in Time magazine’s list of the 100 most influential people in the world.

5. Personal Life and Family:

Savannah Guthrie married her husband, Michael Feldman, in 2014. Feldman is a political and communications consultant. The couple has two children together, a daughter named Vale and a son named Charles Max. Guthrie often shares endearing moments of her family life on social media, giving fans a glimpse into her personal world.

6. Savannah Guthrie’s Height and Fashion:

Given her tall stature, Savannah Guthrie often stands out in the crowd, both on and off the screen. She embraces her height and carries herself with elegance and poise. Guthrie’s impeccable sense of style further enhances her presence, as she effortlessly flaunts an array of fashionable outfits during her on-air appearances.

7. Savannah Guthrie in 2024:

As of 2024, Savannah Guthrie continues to excel in her role as a co-anchor on NBC’s Today show. Her dedication to delivering unbiased news and conducting thought-provoking interviews remains unwavering. With her height, charm, and professionalism, she continues to captivate viewers and make a significant impact in the world of journalism.

Now, let’s address some common questions about Savannah Guthrie:

1. How old is Savannah Guthrie?

As of 2024, Savannah Guthrie is 52 years old.

2. What is Savannah Guthrie’s height?

Savannah Guthrie stands at an impressive height of 5 feet 10 inches (178 cm).

3. What is Savannah Guthrie’s weight?

Savannah Guthrie’s weight is not publicly disclosed. It is important to respect individuals’ privacy regarding their personal information.

4. Who is Savannah Guthrie’s spouse?

Savannah Guthrie is married to Michael Feldman, a political and communications consultant.

5. How many children does Savannah Guthrie have?

Savannah Guthrie has two children, a daughter named Vale and a son named Charles Max.

6. What awards has Savannah Guthrie won?

Savannah Guthrie has received several Emmy Awards for her outstanding work in journalism.

7. Where was Savannah Guthrie born?

Savannah Guthrie was born in Melbourne, Australia. However, she grew up in Tucson, Arizona.

8. When did Savannah Guthrie join NBC News?

Savannah Guthrie joined NBC News in 2007.

9. What is Savannah Guthrie’s educational background?

Savannah Guthrie earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in Journalism from the University of Arizona.

10. Has Savannah Guthrie written any books?

Yes, Savannah Guthrie has authored a children’s book titled “Princesses Wear Pants,” which was published in 2017.

11. Is Savannah Guthrie active on social media?

Yes, Savannah Guthrie is active on social media platforms like Instagram and Twitter, where she shares updates about her professional and personal life.

12. Does Savannah Guthrie have any siblings?

Yes, Savannah Guthrie has a brother named Camron Guthrie.

13. What is Savannah Guthrie’s favorite part of her job?

Savannah Guthrie has mentioned in interviews that her favorite part of her job is conducting interviews and having the opportunity to learn from a diverse range of individuals.

14. How does Savannah Guthrie balance her personal and professional life?

Savannah Guthrie has spoken openly about the challenges of balancing her career and family life. She emphasizes the importance of prioritizing and making time for loved ones while also managing her professional responsibilities.

In conclusion, Savannah Guthrie’s height, along with her remarkable career and personal life, has made her an influential figure in journalism. With her towering presence, insightful interviews, and dedication to delivering the news, Guthrie continues to captivate viewers and inspire aspiring journalists around the world.
